text: Eric Derk Wiebes (born March 12, 1963 in Delft) is a Dutch politician. He is a member of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD). He was minister of Economic Affairs and Climate in the Third Rutte cabinet from October 26, 2017 until January 15, 2021. Wiebes studied mechanical engineering at Delft University of Technology, and obtained a Master of Business Administration at INSEAD. He worked at Royal Dutch Shell, McKinsey & Company, OC&C; Strategy Consultants, and at the Ministry of Economic Affairs. He was an alderman of Amsterdam from 2010 to 2014, and deputy minister of Finance in the Second Rutte cabinet from 2014 to 2017. == References == * Bio at Parlement.com Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Aldermen of the Netherlands Category:Dutch civil servants Category:Government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from Delft Category:People's Party for Freedom and Democracy politicians
title: Eric Wiebes
